name: The Bliss Pub
description:
The Bliss Pub

A tycoon-type game

Ignorance is Bliss

This game was created for the Snappy Gurus Game Off Summer | 2022. In this game, you have to keep your customers blissful and the inspector ignorant.

Keeping everyone unaware of the full picture means everyone stays alive...

And you want that... right?

Trailer The Mafia
  • You must pay back your debts to the mafia, or you might end up in a ditch somewhere soon.
  • The Mafia invest in your business, and you pay them back... with interest.
The Inspector
  • You also have to avoid the inspector's suspicion by keeping your reputation up.
  • If the investigator discovers your scheme, you're done for!
Survive!

See how long you can last in this testing, always escalating, always challenging environment.
